entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Publishing a native AOT library shouldn't publish managed symbols and XML doc files of ProjectReferences #40488
  • aspnetcorev2_inprocess should not be published for PublishAot libraries #40487
  • Environment directives passed to `dotnet` should only be applied to the target process #40484
  • dotnet cli should support json output for almost all of the commands. #40470

Closed

  • Ensure NuGet.Localization is updated as part of the NuGet code flow #39559
  • MsBuild task fails with error NETSDK1004 #40483
    Discussion
  • Unable to run sdk solution in Visual Studio. Wrong compiler version referenced. #40423
  • Improve compilation symbols when multi-targeting #1813
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Clean up PR artifacts publishing #40486
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Accept it if the versions from different sets are equal #40485
    untriaged, Area-Workloads

Merged

  • Update prep-source-build.sh #40480
    VMR
  • Allow pushing to VMR's `main-sdk` branch #40479
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update dotnet/dotnet checkout branch to main-sdk for VMR validation #40467
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update source-mappings.json to remove installer #40464
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Set main-sdk as the temporary VMR branch to push to #40463
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [Main] Make pipeline ymls work with the SDK repo #40451
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2438523 #40397
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Aspire #40111
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Fix reporter encoding #40391
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • Add more workload set tests #40388
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • More workload set fixes #40266
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'main' #40431
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
